Title: ↩️ 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces captured Makhnovka, Sudzha direction...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukrainian forces do not control Sudzha, Kursk region. South of Oleshnya river remains a grey-zone, while the northern half is under Russian control. There is a lot of misinformation regarding the photo of the Ukrainian soldier at Pyaterochka store.… 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces captured Makhnovka, Sudzha direction, in the Kursk region of Russia.Russian forces also captured all the area south of Koronevo and entered Snagost, making the town a grey-zone - both sides report fierce fighting here. Plekhovo is now also a grey-zone after Russian troops successfully advanced and entered the town.Ukrainian forces made no gains in the past 24 hours in Kursk. However numerous Russian sources say Ukraine has just launched a similar operation in the Belovsky district of Kursk, just south of the current Sudzhansky district.
